title: Aaron Rodgers contract, future bets with RJ White (Football 08/30)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by R.J. White of SportsLine and CBSSports.com to discuss the latest news around the NFL, including Aaron Rodgers signing a huge new contract with the Packers, Teddy Bridgewater being traded to the Saints and much more. Then the two break down their best bets for the season, including what Super Bowl bets they like, what win total bets they like and what player prop bets they like.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
